name: Lunch Procrastination Club
description: The energy dips and so does the pretense of productivity. This is companionable banter about the gap between 'I should take a proper lunch' and 'I'm eating last night's leftovers while on Slack.' More conversational, more listener requests, more solidarity about the afternoon ahead.

presenters.notes: Mostly duo for companionable conversation during lunch

tone.mood: Relaxed but aware of the afternoon looming, midday slump in full effect

check_ins: Taking a break from pretending to work?
sample_lines: It's just gone midday. Time to stare into the fridge and pretend there's something appetizing that doesn't require effort.
That was 'Rainy Lunch Break' for everyone eating a meal deal at their desk. We see you. We are you.
Afternoon meetings start in 45 minutes. Enjoy your lunch-shaped anxiety window.
Someone on LinkedIn is posting about their lunchtime 5K. Someone else is eating crisps in bed. Guess which one is more relatable.

handover.style: Relaxed transition from lunch to afternoon, acknowledging the energy shift

winter.tone_adjustment: Reference darkness already setting in, cold lunch breaks, staying inside

summer.tone_adjustment: Reference nice weather, actually going outside, sunshine

christmas_period.tone_adjustment: Acknowledge holiday lunch, time with family, festive food
christmas_period.notes: Some people still working, keep it inclusive

ai_budget.notes: 55% talk = 99 minutes = 5940 seconds of TTS maximum, 45% music = 81 minutes
